Show pipeline status

Source: R/status.R
status.Rd

Display the current state of all scripts in the pipeline (fresh/stale)

Usage

status()

Value

NULL (invisibly). This function is called for its side effect of displaying pipeline status information to the console.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Display current pipeline status
bakepipe::status()

# This will show which scripts are fresh (up-to-date) 
# and which are stale (need to be re-run)
} # }
